channel.title: Donors items
channel.description:
the dude who i got the sorce from has all rares set as donors items how do i make them all for players aswell, the server is EXTREMMLY well done so i dont want to get rid of it, under what file or something will they be under and what do i change beacuse in my player fiels i cant seem to find anything about donotor stats
heres a made up user and pass but thw the char file looks like
[ACCOUNT] character-username = Bashardfdf character-password = siim character-reason =
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3088 character-posy = 3492 character-rights = 0 character-lastconnection = www.google.com character-playerconnectcheck = www.google.com character-special = 100 character-tz = -1 character-publicchat = 0 character-privatechat = 0 character-tradecompete = 0 character-clue = 0 character-cluekill = 0 character-starter = 1 character-donate = 0 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 100 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 0 character-Hans = 0 character-qp = 0 character-questCape = 0 character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15 character-q12 = 15 character-q13 = 15 character-q14 = 15 character-q15 = 15 character-q16 = 15 character-brwTotal = 0 character-jungleDemon = 0 character-RfdWave = 0 character-maxedStats = 1 character-brightness = 1 character-fighttype = 1 character-skill = 0 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100 character-expLock = false character-pkPoints = 0 character-dCommand = 0
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 2 character-look = 2 10 character-look = 3 18 character-look = 4 26 character-look = 5 33 character-look = 6 36 character-look = 7 42 character-look = 8 0 character-look = 9 0 character-look = 10 0 character-look = 11 0 character-look = 12 0 character-look = 13 0 character-look = 14 0 character-look = 15 0 character-look = 16 0 character-look = 17 0 character-look = 18 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 1 0 character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 1 0 character-skill = 3 10 1155 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 99 14000000 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 0 character-skill = 14 1 0 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
[ITEMS] character-item = 0 393 200 character-item = 1 2438 10 character-item = 2 2442 10 character-item = 3 2444 10 character-item = 4 3026 10 character-item = 5 3018 10 character-item = 6 2450 10 character-item = 7 842 1 character-item = 8 883 100 character-item = 9 1324 1 character-item = 10 1332 1 character-item = 11 1334 1 character-item = 12 4589 1 character-item = 13 996 1000000 character-item = 14 6123 1

item.title: Donors items
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

lol, this is all wrong.
you want them to be for all players?
go in client.java and search for:

if(wearID == 13646 && (donator != 1)) { // by Owner Bashar sM("You Need To Be A Donator To Wear This Item."); return false; }
remove everything that has that

Read full topic

item.title: Donors items
item.dc:creator: @CatsGoMeow CatsGoMeow
item.description:
@CatsGoMeow wrote:

If you look he was asking where to find the “donator = 0”. He posted the character file. I showed him where it was in the character file, you spammed the thread telling him things he already knew.

Read full topic

item.title: Donors items
item.dc:creator: @lostbro lostbro
item.description:
@lostbro wrote:

[quote=“CatsGoMeow, post:5, topic:353291”][code]
character-donator = 0 <— change that to 1
character-bow = 100
character-shield = 100
character-expLock = false
character-pkPoints = 0
character-dCommand = 0

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
[/code][/quote]

the fuk ur posting the exact same thing i already told him

Read full topic

item.title: Donors items
item.dc:creator: @lostbro lostbro
item.description:
@lostbro wrote:

if you have donator added, go into config-donators and add ur name/players names in there and go into ur character file and beside this might be different on yours ->> character-donator = 0 make that a 1

Read full topic

item.title: Donors items
item.dc:creator: @lostbro lostbro
item.description:
@lostbro wrote:

go server side, client.java ctrl+F donator == 0){ or whatever you have in ur server and find ur phat id’s and remove the donator == 0){ part off them and remove them from that shop.

Read full topic
